name: Familiar Familiar
description:
The first project of our four-person student team.
Made in autumn 2018.

Familiar Familiar is a 2.5D platformer game where you control a witches' mighty dragon familiar... who accidentally got turned into a small twerp. Your goal is to climb around the witches' cabin to get up on a shelf where your cure lies. But beware of obstacles on your way, for a witches' home can be a dangerous place for such a small creature.

Guide:
The character moves left and right with A & D buttons, and jumps by pressing  SPACE.
The game doesn't have a quit button, so it needs to be manually closed.
